title: Advisor

fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Trusted: The King knows who you are. You share a Whisper channel with them. If you exist, this means the King NOT Chaos aligned (but may be Outsider aligned). 
- High Profile: The Chaos knows you exist. You CANNOT let the Chaos know who you are. The Chaos has one chance at guessing you in their faction chat. If the Chaos guesses you while you are alive, you Die at the end of the phase. (HP set to 0, then minus any damage taken)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Assistance: Upgrade a card in your Hand. [2 uses, Unique]
- Preparations: Gain a non-Special card of your choice. [5 uses, 1 CD] 
- Deliver: Give a card in your Hand to another player. [3 uses, 1 CD, Astral]

desc: This role may also win with Outsider King.
